Package it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatManager
    thread which handle the processing of all the message-types contained in chatMessageTypeSet into MessageManager.
    GameRegistry
    singleton class which contains all the information about all the games handle by the server.
    MessageManager
    MessageManager is a singleton class which handle all the messages of the server.
    RMIListener
    network thread responsable of the management of RMI connections.
    RMIServer
    perform all the function linked to the RMI connections management.
    ServerMessageFactory
    this class allows to simply generate all the messages used on the server side of the game in their JSON format.
    SocketInfoContainer
    class containing all the information about the socket connection of a player SocketInfoContainer.socket: the socket object associated to the connection SocketInfoContainer.in: the scanner open on the inputStream of the socket, used to recive messages SocketInfoContainer.out: the PrintWriter open on the outputStream of the socket, used to send message
    SocketListener
    network thread responsable of opening new socket connections, which will be used by SocketReaderThread to send and recive messages SocketListener.serverSocket: the ServerSocket object used to open new connections SocketListener.socketPlayerRegistry: ConcurrentHashMap which map for each client UUID the relative SocketInfoContainer object SocketListener.stop: flag used to stop the thread
    SocketReaderThread
    network thread responsable of the management of socket connections.
